fields.text: Thank you for calling DNAnexus in South Bay, the cloud-based genome informatics and data management platform accelerating genomic medicine.
Press [INDEX] for technical support or system status.
Press [INDEX] to connect to a technical support specialist.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.
Press [INDEX] for automated system status updates.
Please hold while we retrieve the current system status.
Press [INDEX] for sales, licensing, and partnership inquiries.
Press [INDEX] to speak with a sales representative.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships division.
